p: All NMR (nuclear magnetic resonance) spectra of α-KBA were recorded on a 500 MHz Bruker Avance III HD spectrometer equipped with a CryoPlatform and a 5 mm TCI CryoProbe (Bruker Biospin, Karlsruhe, Germany). Spectrometer control and data processing were accomplished with Bruker TopSpin Ver. 3.6.1. The sample was measured in DMSO- d 6 and data were referenced to the remaining solvent signals at δ H 2.50 and δ C 39.51, respectively.
